abstract: tata motors upgraded at zacks investment research .
article: tata motors was upgraded by zacks investment research from a `` hold '' rating to a `` buy '' rating in a report released on saturday . the brokerage presently has a $ 37.00 price objective on the stock . zacks investment research 's target price points to a potential upside of 11.78 % from the stock 's previous close . according to zacks , `` tata motors is india 's leading automotive manufacturer . `` a number of other research firms also recently issued reports on ttm . jefferies group began coverage on shares of tata motors in a research note on monday , january 8th .

they issued a `` buy '' rating on the stock . valuengine raised shares of tata motors from a `` hold '' rating to a `` buy '' rating in a research note on friday , december 1st . one research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating , two have issued a hold rating and four have issued a buy rating to the company . tata motors has an average rating of `` hold '' and an average target price of $ 33.50 . shares of tata motors traded up $ 0.48 during mid-day trading on friday , reaching $ 33.10 .

1,160,000 shares of the company 's stock were exchanged , compared to its average volume of 1,086,395 . the company has a quick ratio of 0.63 , a current ratio of 0.98 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.79 . tata motors has a one year low of $ 28.97 and a one year high of $ 40.34 . the stock has a market capitalization of $ 22,146.63 , a p/e ratio of 16.39 , a peg ratio of 0.20 and a beta of 2.21 . tata motors last released its quarterly earnings results on thursday , november 9th . the company reported $ 0.57 earnings per share for the quarter .

tata motors had a net margin of 4.05 % and a return on equity of 14.78 % . analysts anticipate that tata motors will post 3.52 earnings per share for the current fiscal year . several institutional investors have recently added to or reduced their stakes in ttm . next financial group inc purchased a new stake in shares of tata motors in the 3rd quarter valued at approximately $ 100,000 . mml investors services llc raised its stake in shares of tata motors by 7.3 % in the 2nd quarter . mml investors services llc now owns 6,460 shares of the company 's stock valued at $ 213,000 after acquiring an additional 441 shares during the period .

advisor group inc. . raised its stake in shares of tata motors by 8.1 % in the 2nd quarter . advisor group inc. . now owns 7,254 shares of the company 's stock valued at $ 214,000 after acquiring an additional 542 shares during the period . quantbot technologies lp purchased a new stake in shares of tata motors in the 2nd quarter valued at approximately $ 226,000 . finally , stifel financial corp acquired a new position in shares of tata motors in the third quarter valued at approximately $ 231,000 . 10.91 % of the stock is currently owned by institutional investors and hedge funds .
